name: saboaria-website
description: Sol e Espuma Saboaria Website with advanced build optimization

scripts.build:simple: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js && npm run minify-html && npm run update-html
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r images dist/ && cp -r webfonts dist/ && cp products.json dist/
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o dist/css/style.min.css css/style.css && cleancss -o dist/css/modal.min.css css/modal.css
scripts.update-html: sed -i 's/css\/style.css/css\/style.min.css/g' dist/index.html && sed -i 's/css\/modal.css/css\/modal.min.css/g' dist/index.html && sed -i 's/js\/main.js/js\/main.min.js/g' dist/index.html
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Build ready for deployment in dist/ folder'
scripts.test-build: npm run build && echo 'Build test completed successfully'

author: Sol e Espuma Saboaria
